title: Sewing And Placket Sampler, 1895
medium:
Medium: cotton and silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, button hole, and sewing stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Two plackets, two needle lace insertions, patches, and button holes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sewing And Placket Sampler, 1895.
1895. Medium: cotton and silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, button hole, and sewing stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-319.
